mapper.select: select sno,cno,score from course_stu where sno = #{sno};
mapper.update: update course_stu set score = #{score} where sno = #{sno} and cno = #{cno};
mapper.select: SELECT s.sname sname, cs.score score FROM student s JOIN course_stu cs ON s.sno = cs.sno JOIN course c ON cs.cno = c.cno WHERE c.cno = #{cno};
